蔾字的基本解释

蔾
lí
同“藜”。

蔾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》力脂切，平脂，來。］
［《廣韻》郎奚切，平齊，來。］
同“藜1”。
蒺藜。

蔾字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蔾； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1056第19
【唐韻】力脂切，音棃。【玉篇】蒺蔾。【韻略】旱草。【師曠曰】歲欲旱，草先生蒺蔾也。【易·困卦】據于蒺蔾。　又蔾蘆，見蘆字註。　又姓。【通志·氏族略】淮南有此姓。　又【韻會】憐題切，音黎。入齊韻，訓義同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　 Quinoa; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1056 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Lizhi cuts, sound. [Jade articles] Tribulus. 【Rhyme】Dry grass. [Shi Kuang said] The year is about to be drought, and Mr. Grass also has thistles. [Yi·Kun Gua] Based on Tribulus Terrestris.　It's Veratrum again, see the note for Lu.　Another last name. [Tongzhi·Clan Profile] Huainan has this surname.　[Yunhui] pity the question, Yin Li. Enter Qi Yun, the same meaning.
